sentences.sentence: Her eyes looked at me searchingly in the face.
sentences.translation: 她两只眼睛骨溜溜地看着我的脸。

sentences.sentence: Are you really happy with him, asked her mother, gazing at Vera searchingly.
sentences.translation: 和他在一起你真的快乐吗，维拉的妈妈问她，细心地盯着。

sentences.sentence: When I became aware of this right-about- turn , I was indignant and questioned searchingly the officers concerned .
sentences.translation: 当我知道这种向后转的变更时，我非常愤怒，便向有关军官追根究底地询问原因。
